active_channels.title: Active Channels
active_channels.name: active
active_channels.description: Configure channels that Sayumi can send messages to.
usage: <add / remove> <channel ID / name or direct tag>
active_channels.notes: By default Sayumi will prioritize looking for 'bot' channel then 'general' if no such channel found.

message_log.title: Message Log
message_log.name: msglog
message_log.description: Log deleted/edited messages from users and notify in the selected channel.

unknown_replies.title: Unknown Command Response
unknown_replies.name: unknowncmd
unknown_replies.description: Settings for responses to unknown commands.
usage: <add | remove> <channel ID / name or direct tag>

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.name: prefix
prefix.description: Configure Sayumi's prefix in this server.
prefix.notes: Alternately, you can configure the prefix quicky using command {prefix}prefix
